website_summaries.verdict: Full of charm and fast-paced play, Color Sheep is a strong casual game for Android.
cons: Always have to restart from beginning

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully animated
customer_reviews.text: You are Woolston, a black sheep. As the wolves approach, you have to change the colour of your wool to match the wolve's fur then blast them with your sheep laser. OK, so it sounds ridiculous, but it's insanely addictive. It starts of simple, just light and dark variants of red, blue and green, but then you have to start blending the palette and remembering the correct combination whilst the pressure is on can get pretty frantic. Collect power-ups, like shields & lightning strikes to help Woolston survive along the way. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Addictive little game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wee game. Basically, you have to change your sheep to match the colour of the wolves that are coming to get you. Easy at first but quickly gets more different as more colour combinations are introduced. Addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Marion MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This game is very addictive! I really loved this game and ended up spending lots of hours playing it. I might have neglected a few house chores just so I can play this game. The only thing I think could be improved would be a feature to save the progress of the game, but other than that I think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Andreea

customer_reviews.title: Color Sheep
customer_reviews.text: It has kept the youngsters amused off and on for days. We enjoyed competing with each other and laughing nonstop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I think this I s a brilliant game. I'm glad I got it when it was free. It's very stimulating.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. AS Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: cute but difficult
customer_reviews.text: fun but a bit too fast and stressful to enjoy properly, i love the concept though
customer_reviews.author: cbasrs

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this is a good and funny game to play, a bit quick though when u need 2 colours ,but may be thats my age and im a bit slow,lol
customer_reviews.author: annie m

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: good, intresting game. intresting to play. helps with stragety and mind games. i like trying to figure out all the levels.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Guppy

customer_reviews.title: probably very much more challenging than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Being somewhat old I use this to try and keep my reaction times up. My granddaughter found it very challenging. i do not think I will reach her level ever
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Color Sheep
customer_reviews.text: what a great game this is my daughters play all the time but they know their home work comes first
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game have to be quick but really enjoy really makes you think quite hard but trying to beat my score each time love it
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: It gets VERY hard
customer_reviews.text: Quite fun for a while. But I got bored quickly as it got to ridiculous amount of colour combinations. Yet, it is still cool.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep the kids entertained
customer_reviews.text: My 8 years old loves it and it has kept her happy on a few long train journeys we've been on lately.
customer_reviews.author: Gra & Co

customer_reviews.title: Good graphics and simple concept
customer_reviews.text: Cute graphics with simple game play. If only they had more than just arcade game play so you don't always start from the start and just completed the levels.
customer_reviews.author: insta_llama

customer_reviews.title: Baaarmy Game
customer_reviews.text: Good game but dont like how it works with fingers just gets crazy and too fast for me .. ..
customer_reviews.author: E M Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Not easy.
customer_reviews.text: Struggled with this as it needs a lot of concentration. Good idea for a game different to any other game I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY BEE

customer_reviews.title: Colour Sheep
customer_reviews.text: This game is excellently brilliant. I love it because it is really fun and colourful which is really good and everyone should get it! But the thing to improve is the scores; it would be better if you could just see how many wolves you hit it would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: The game is very repetitive and doesn't really involve any more skill than speedily pressing one of two buttons before the wolf gets close - which didn't seem to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Henderson

customer_reviews.title: ab fab
customer_reviews.text: You need quick thinking and reactions,haven't laughed or panicked this much in ages, you Will love this. MINT SAUCE anyone? I've got loads of dead lamb!!!
customer_reviews.author: julie beal

customer_reviews.title: my kids love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game, where you have to match the colour of the sheep to the colour of the wolves. This game challenges kids to think quick on their feet and is a fun and frantic game. Got it for free but would pay for it too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Bellaly

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing game to do with a sheep and colour. Very addictive with loads of worlds to play.Great game and its a must have!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: noodles

customer_reviews.title: Not counting sheep!
customer_reviews.text: This sheep will keep you awake as you turn the black sheep, Woolson, to the colours of the wolves (a sheep in wolf's clothing) in order to then blast them. It's great fun, addictive. One to download and keep.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Red and green do not make yellow
customer_reviews.text: Quite an interesting concept, but once you have to remember how to mix colors, it's rather off putting to find the game expects you to make yellow by mixing red and green etc
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rollings

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun...
customer_reviews.text: What a fun game! The tutorial is simple and clear. You have to match the colour of your sheep to the bad wolves in order to be able to blast them away in time. It's not as easy as you think. You have to match dark and bright colours, and as the game progress you have to mix colours at the same time. And while you are mixing colours and matching bright and dark shades the baddies gets faster and faster!!! Eeeeeek! YES, I squealed! Happy to get this for free as the free app of the day. But would pay for it if it wasn't free.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Totally Addicting
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. The graphics are cute, the rules are simple yet you are kept going with increasing levels of difficulty and I think it's really unique. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: There is a U in colour
customer_reviews.text: Honestly haven't played for long but it seems mildly amusing and entertaining. I hope I would improve quite quickly as it seemed to step up sharply. Will be interested to know how others find it, maybe I just wasn't very good.
customer_reviews.author: L Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got that far into it, as I find it quite hard, however I love it!! I would recommend getting this app.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Original concept
customer_reviews.text: I can understand all the rave reviews, as on the whole the game merits it. Original concept, reasonable graphics and sound and fun...for a while. Unfortunately this doesn't detract from the fact that you're ultimately doing the same few things over and over again. Fair play to the designers for an original and well executed idea. I just found it dull after a matter of minutes. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: DarkAngel 1892
